node.statement: ALTERNATIVE: DIRECT EPI PROOF VIA BRASCAMP-LIEB: The Brascamp-Lieb inequality on the unitary group (or its finite analog on permutation groups/symmetric functions) may directly yield the EPI. The MSS convolution structure as an expectation over Haar measure makes it amenable to concentration and log-Sobolev techniques. If EPI holds with a sharp constant, the Stam inequality follows with equality at n=2.
